Text:
I can't really comment on the progressive quality of this product however i can honestly say that, it's fundamentally sound enough.

I was lured into f'narring my computer up with the "recently removed from TPB" DRPSu-x32-x-64 torrent. It right royally f'narked everything up and this torrent fixed the problem quite swiftly.

Basically, the application installs, activates and fixes things - that's what i needed and i'm damn thankful i got it!

Thanks bigwimpie, for time and effort!
2nd serial expired, but the 3rd worked for me!---Thank You, bigwimpie!
thanks for the hard work Big!
So far so good, used the 3rd serial after installation, I did a scan of my drivers and I am updating my graphics card as I type.

Program is not very selective in the drivers it downloads, and ALL of the drivers it found (Windows 7 x64) were in fact OLDER than those already on the system.

Searches for more driver than driver genius pro, though I would highly recommend manually installing the drivers this programs finds, as they're not all that reliable. Would still recommend driver genius pro over this program.
